org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.condition

Interface JavaClassBuilderAt

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.Condition, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.ConditionBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaClass

    public interface JavaClassBuilderAt
extends org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.ConditionBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      JavaClassBuilderAt annotationMatches(AnnotationTypeCondition condition)

      JavaClassBuilderAt annotationMatches(String element, AnnotationCondition condition)
      Specifies a specific condition match for filtering annotations based upon their elements.
      org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.ConditionBuilder as(String variable)

    • Method Detail

      • annotationMatches

        JavaClassBuilderAt annotationMatches(String element,
                                     AnnotationCondition condition)
        Specifies a specific condition match for filtering annotations based upon their elements.

      • annotationMatches

        JavaClassBuilderAt annotationMatches(AnnotationTypeCondition condition)
        Specifies an annotation that must be present on the current element. If the current item is a method, type declaration, or member declaration, then this will match on any annotations present on this item. If the current item is itself an annotation, then this will match on any "sibling" annotations.

      • as

        org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.ConditionBuilder as(String variable)
        Specify the the variable in which to store matching JavaTypeReferenceModel results, and complete the builder, returning a fully configured Condition object.
